name: conductor
description: Context-Driven Development for Codex - A structured approach to software development that treats context as a managed artifact
author: septrcode

commands.name: setup
commands.description: Scaffold the project and set up the Conductor environment

commands.name: newTrack
commands.description: Start a new feature or bug track

commands.name: implement
commands.description: Execute the tasks defined in the current track's plan

commands.name: status
commands.description: Display the current progress of the tracks file and active tracks

commands.name: revert
commands.description: Revert a track, phase, or task by analyzing git history
